label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_011
content:
## 2024-09-12 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 11830886
- Unique source IPs: 1493
- Unique destination IPs: 5345
- Average flow duration (sec): 44.2
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 80.2
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 13.1
- ICMP percentage: 1.1
- Long-lived flows greater than 1 hour: 92
- East-West traffic percentage: 60.0

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 3321156
- Unique domains: 65863
- NXDOMAIN responses: 5642
- DGA suspected domains: 3
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 4855
- Average response time (ms): 5.5
- Cache hit percentage: 89.5
- TXT record queries: 654
- PTR queries: 5134

### Ids Ips Hits

- Anomaly detections: 17

- Severity medium: 74
- Severity low: 282
- Top signatures:

  - ET EXPLOIT Apache Log4j RCE Attempt
  - ET WEB_SERVER SQL Injection Attempt
- False positive rate percentage: 12.4

- NetFlow anomaly: uncommon protocol from 10.30.231.200 — investigated, benign

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-12. 11830886 flows analyzed. 3321156 DNS queries. 436 IDS alerts (2 critical, 11 high). WAN avg 5.22/1.64 Gbps in/out. 3 BGP announcements.
